metadata.Title: CVE-2023-2609 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
NULL Pointer Dereference in GitHub repository vim/vim prior to 9.0.1531.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-2609` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

vim - 2:8.1.2269-1ubuntu5.15
vim-athena - 2:8.1.2269-1ubuntu5.15
vim-common - 2:8.1.2269-1ubuntu5.15
vim-gtk - 2:8.1.2269-1ubuntu5.15
vim-gtk3 - 2:8.1.2269-1ubuntu5.15
vim-gui-common - 2:8.1.2269-1ubuntu5.15
vim-nox - 2:8.1.2269-1ubuntu5.15
vim-runtime - 2:8.1.2269-1ubuntu5.15
vim-tiny - 2:8.1.2269-1ubuntu5.15
xxd - 2:8.1.2269-1ubuntu5.15
No subscription required

notes.Note: ccdm94> for bionic and earlier, the vulnerable function is in file src/ops.c.

criterions.comment: vim package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:8.1.2269-1ubuntu5.15').
